title: What software can I use to send bulk WhatsApp messages? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you wanna learn to send bulk message on whatsapp, a good software is necessary. Normally people use queen turbol, whatsapp sender pro, blaster sender from Ukraine seller. After you get a software,which might requires you to generate big quantity of whatsapp channels as sender’s number. Anyway,it is easy to get result on google with keywords of whatsapp hash channels or whatsapp queen channels.
twilio provide this service:Twilio API for WhatsApp Pricing
